title: Microsoft massively strengthens its presence in India with a $17.5 billion investment
description: Microsoft will invest $17.5bn in India by 2029 to accelerate the development of its cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure. This commitment, the company's largest in Asia, will span...
content: Microsoft will invest $17.5bn in India by 2029 to accelerate the development of its cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure. This commitment, the company's largest in Asia, will span 2026-2029 and includes building data centers, deploying AI... [715 chars]

title: AI masking the economy cuts both ways
description: The artificial intelligence boom once again shielded the stock market from the sharp macroeconomic edges of 2025. But there's a gnawing anxiety that the dominant AI theme could do the opposite next year - even as it overshadows the real economy.
content: LONDON, Dec 10 (Reuters) - The artificial intelligence boom once again shielded the stock market from the sharp macroeconomic edges of 2025. But there's a gnawing anxiety that the dominant AI theme could do the opposite next year - even as it oversha... [5077 chars]

title: EU launches antitrust investigation into google over AI content use
description: The European Commission has launched an antitrust investigation into Alphabet-owned Google, examining how the company uses publishers’ online content and users’ YouTube videos to train its artificial intelligence (AI) services, and whether publishers are being fairly compensated for their work.

title: South Korea to require advertisers to label AI-generated ads
description: South Korea will require advertisers to label their ads made with artificial intelligence technologies from next year as it seeks to curb a surge of deceptive promotions featuring fabricated experts or deep-faked celebrities endorsing food or pharmaceutical products on social media

title: AI Checker: How Modern AI Checking Tools Improve Content Quality and User Trust
description: Artificial intelligence tools have changed the way people write, research, and communicate online. From emails and essays to articles and marketing content, AI-generated text is now more common than ever. While these tools can boost productivity, they also raise new questions about originality, clarity, and trust. This is where an AI checker becomes increasingly important. AI […]

title: India has an extraordinary depth of both artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence: Miranda Collard
description: TP, formerly Teleperformance, is significantly expanding its operations in India. The company is actively hiring in tier 2 and tier 3 cities to access a wider talent pool. TP is investing heavily in technological capabilities and digital customer experience services. New delivery centers are opening, with plans for further expansion in metro and non-metro cities.
